lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Angelique Kerber is the only player in the WTA Finals Red Group to stand at 2-0 in the round-robin stage after a 6-4, 6-2 win over Simona Halep on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Kerber Beats Halep, Goes to 2-0 in Red Group at WTA Finals
headline.main: Kerber Beats Halep, Goes to 2-0 in Red Group at WTA Finals

snippet: Top-seeded Angelique Kerber is the only player in the WTA Finals Red Group to stand at 2-0 in the round-robin stage after a 6-4, 6-2 win over Simona Halep on Tuesday....
